data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Houhun, Wang, Zhibo, Hu, Bingbing (2015): Four new species of Epicephala Meyrick, 1880 (Lepidoptera, Gracillariidae) associated with two species of Glochidion (Phyllanthaceae) from Hainan Island in China. ZooKeys 508: 53-67, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.508.9479, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.508.9479
